step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in and tightening your muscles. Try to keep your fists closed tightly as you inhale.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on a smooth exhale and relaxing your muscles as you open.
Great work on the outward movement and muscle relaxation. Ensure your fingers are fully open and arms are extended to shoulder height.
You're doing well with the repetitions. Keep the movements controlled and focus on the exhale as you extend your arms.
Your arm extension and muscle relaxation are improving. For the next repetitions, aim for a more consistent and controlled movement throughout.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the horizontal pumping exercise. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles while bringing your arms in, then exhale and relax as you open your arms wide. Keep up the great work!
